frontmatter.title: General Topology
frontmatter.meta: @book{willard-general-topology-2012, title = {General Topology}, author = {Willard, Stephen}, year = {2012}, address = {Newburyport}, isbn = {0-486-13178-5}, publisher = {Dover Publications}, series = {Dover Books on Mathematics}, }

tree.mainmatter: A topological space X is called a regular if for any closed F \subseteq X and any x \notin F, there exist disjoint open sets containing x and F. Adapted from Definition 14.1 of Willard's General Topology.
